summary: Ruby is a follower that prefers ranged weapons, as I was unhappy with the Vanilla game; where Followers only use bows at certain times.
descriptionHtml:
1,000 Views! Thank You!

Ruby is a follower that prefers ranged weapons, as I was unhappy with the Vanilla game; where Followers only use bows at certain times.
She is based around Sapphire and Ysolda, who was the base character used to model Ruby.
She is also inspired by Sapphire, and carries 2 rubies to represent her alias.
She is a Follower, and she is also a Marriage Candidate.
When I upload more mods to come, no doubt she will be Incompatible.
This is my First uploaded mod, and there are three files.
They are all the same - It does not matter which one you choose.
-- Known Issues --
Sometimes she will not have the appropriate disposition towards you.
If this is the case; click on her and type in the Console "Setrelationshiprank player 4" without the Quotation Marks and she will follow you. This is being fixed.

I can confirm in Windowed Mode Ruby will attack you. Revert to an earlier save, or kill somebody, go to Jail and wait out your sentence. This is also being fixed
Version 1.5.1 Planned to come out within the week.
-------------------------------
I AM TAKING REQUESTS!
author: OGMSCOLEPEARSON
